name: Little Sunshine’s Bubble Bliss™ Bubble Bath
description:
Little Sunshine's Bubble Bliss™ Bubble Bath

Add to the bath to cleanse and soften tender skin.

Contains Chamomile Extract, as well as Geranium and Ylang Ylang Oils from validated sources.

No Little Sunshine's product contains Palm Oil.

$9.50 excl. GST (GST will be added on checkout.)

Postage is $3.50 for orders below $25, or $5.00 for orders between $25 and $50. For orders over $50, postage is free!

name: Little Sunshine’s Squeaky Clean™ Shampoo
description:
Little Sunshine's Squeaky Clean™ Shampoo

Non-irritating, low-foaming shampoo. Especially effective in removing cradle cap build-up.

Contains Chamomile, Chickweed and Nettle Extracts, as well as Geranium and Ylang Ylang Oils from validated sources.

Also contains Fumaric Acid (derived from fruit sources) which may assist in the removal of Cradle Cap in infants. Give our shampoo a try!

No Little Sunshine's product contains Palm Oil.

Tip: Rub some Quiet Time baby oil into scalp before bathing to soften build-up. 

$9.50 excl. GST (GST will be added on checkout.)

Postage is $3.50 for orders below $25, or $5.00 for orders between $25 and $50. For orders over $50, postage is free!

name: Little Sunshine's Tangle-Free™ Hair Conditioner
description:
Little Sunshine's Tangle-Free™ Hair Conditioner

A light conditioner for ouch-less combing and soft, more manageable hair. 

Contains Chamomile, Chickweed and Nettle Extracts, as well as Geranium and Ylang Ylang Oils from validated sources.

No Little Sunshine's product contains Palm Oil.

$9.50 excl. GST (GST will be added on checkout.)

Postage is $3.50 for orders below $25, or $5.00 for orders between $25 and $50. For orders over $50, postage is free!

name: Little Sunshine’s Tender Touch™ Body Balm
description:
Little Sunshine's Tender Touch™ Body Balm

A finely textured protective baby lotion that will soothe and moisturise tender skin.

Contains Chamomile, Calendula and Hypericum Extracts, as well as Geranium and Ylang Ylang Oils from validated sources.

We recommend the application of a gentle, low irritant sunscreen for added protection.

No Little Sunshine's product contains Palm Oil.

$9.50 excl. GST (GST will be added on checkout.)

Postage is $3.50 for orders below $25, or $5.00 for orders between $25 and $50. For orders over $50, postage is free!

name: Little Sunshine’s Tot’s Bot™ Nappy Cream
description:
Little Sunshine's Tot's Bot™ Nappy Cream. 
A rich yet non-greasy cream that provides a first line of defence against redness, chafing and burning in the delicate nappy area. 

Contains Calendula, Chamomile and Chickweed Extracts, as well as Geranium and Ylang Ylang Oils from validated sources.

No Little Sunshine's product contains Palm Oil.

$10.90 excl. GST (GST will be added on checkout.)

Postage is $3.50 for orders below $25, or $5.00 for orders between $25 and $50. For orders over $50, postage is free!

name: Little Sunshine’s Quiet Time™ Baby Oil / Massage Oil
description:
Little Sunshine's Quiet Time™ Baby Oil  Massage Oil

A luxurious blend of botanical oils with a multitude of uses. Ideal for baby massage as its light and readily absorbed.

Contains Geranium and Ylang Ylang Oils from validated sources. 

Apply sparingly to cradle cap before shampooing.  A few drops added to the bath water help prevent the drying effect of water.

No Little Sunshine's product contains Palm Oil.

$9.50 excl. GST (GST will be added on checkout.)

Postage is $3.50 for orders below $25, or $5.00 for orders between $25 and $50. For orders over $50, postage is free!
